casebody.data:
Wednesday, December 12, 2001

MOTION DOCKET

98-1474. State v. Coley.

Lucas C.P. No. CR971449. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution pending filing of timely application to reopen pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. XI(5),

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, granted.

IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that if such application to reopen is timely filed, this stay shall continue pending final disposition of the application.
